subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Johan Santana picked up the victory in a rare five-inning outing and the Minnesota Twins hung on to defeat Julián Tavárez and the visiting Boston Red Sox last night, 2-1.
snippet: Johan Santana picked up the victory in a rare five-inning outing and the Minnesota Twins hung on to defeat Julián Tavárez and the visiting Boston Red Sox last night, 2-1.
